#Install  manual for Linux

= Installation =

Now, this manual is for Linux only

==Linux requirements==
Before compile the source code, you should install the following libraries:

 curl-devel
 libxml2-devel


=CentOS/Federa=

 #ssudo yum install curl
 #ssudo yum install curl-devel
 #ssudo yum install libxml2
 #ssudo yum install libxml2-devel
